main event: A civilian observer reported seeing a single unidentified object with a sharp, brilliant bluish light hovering over an airstrip in Marysville, California, on December 6, 1953.
interesting points: The object was observed hovering at an altitude of 300 feet before dropping to 100-150 feet., The object was described as having a bluish light that did not rotate and accelerated to speeds of 140-150 mph., The sighting lasted for about 1-2 minutes as the object disappeared into the night., The conclusion stated that a jet with afterburner was ruled out because the observer was too close to not hear sound., The report was tied to historical context as part of Project Blue Book investigations.
sighted object: one unidentified object with a brilliant bluish light
